import axios from"axios";export default{// Get book from google search 
getGoogleSearchBooks:function getGoogleSearchBooks(query){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q="+query);},// Gets all books
getBooks:function getBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},// Gets the book with the given id
getBook:function getBook(id){return axios.get("/api/books/"+id);},// Deletes the book with the given id
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);},// Saves a book to the database
saveBook:function saveBook(savedBooks){return axios.post("/api/books",savedBooks);}};
